info.title: OData Service for namespace OData.Demo
info.description:
This OData service is located at [http://localhost/service-root/](http://localhost/service-root/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](http://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Customer{bg:orange}],[Customer]-*>[Order],[Customer]-*>[Sales],[Customer]-0..1>[Address],[Customer]-0..1>[PhoneNumber],[Supplier{bg:orange}],[Supplier]-*>[Product],[Supplier]-*>[Address],[Product{bg:orange}],[Product]-0..1>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[Supplier],[Product]-*>[OrderItem],[Product]-*>[Sales],[Order{bg:orange}],[Order]-*>[OrderItem],[Order]-0..1>[Customer],[Order]-0..1>[Address],[Customer]^[VipCustomer{bg:orange}],[Category{bg:orange}],[Category]-*>[Product],[OrderItem{bg:orange}],[OrderItem]-0..1>[Order],[OrderItem]-0..1>[Product],[OrderItem]-0..1>[Currency],[Sales{bg:orange}],[Sales]-0..1>[Time],[Sales]-0..1>[Currency],[Sales]-0..1>[Customer],[Sales]-0..1>[SalesOrganization],[Sales]-0..1>[Product],[Employee{bg:orange}],[Employee]-0..1>[Manager],[Employee]-*>[LeaveRequest],[LeaveRequest{bg:orange}],[LeaveRequest]-0..1>[Manager],[LeaveRequest]-0..1>[Employee],[Address],[Address]-0..1>[Example.Country{bg:whitesmoke}],[Address]-0..1>[Example.City{bg:whitesmoke}],[AddressWithLocation],[Country{bg:orange}],[Supplier]^[PreferredSupplier{bg:orange}],[PreferredSupplier]-0..1>[Employee],[Employee]^[Manager{bg:orange}],[Manager]-*>[Employee],[Manager]-*>[LeaveRequest],[Time{bg:orange}],[Time]-*>[Sales],[SalesOrganization{bg:orange}],[SalesOrganization]-*>[Sales],[SalesOrganization]-0..1>[SalesOrganization],[Currency{bg:orange}],[Currency]-*>[Sales],[City{bg:orange}],[PhoneNumber],[CellPhoneNumber])

## References
- [Org.OData.Core.V1](https://github.com/oasis-tcs/odata-vocabularies/blob/master/vocabularies/Org.OData.Core.V1.md)

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

CountryName.description: This is weird, given that we have a Country entity type

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [OData Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374630)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [OData Paging - Skip](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374631)

filter.name: $filter

search.name: $search
